thread.section_title: AllAfrica News: Economy, Business and Finance
thread.title: Kenya: Teachers to Attend Rally

title: Kenya: Teachers to Attend Rally
text:
South Africa: Teaching Resumes At Roodepoort Primary By Henry Wanyama 
STRIKING teachers are to rally today at Uhuru Park in another attempt to push the government to pay the court ordered 50-60 per cent salary increase. 
Cotu and the Trade Union Congress of Kenya are the organisers of the rally that will start at 9.30am. 
Cotu secretary general Francis Atwoli said he will participate in the rally meant to whip the government into agreeing to pay teachers. 
Kuppet secretary general Akello Misori said there was an early morning meeting yesterday to put final touches to the meeting. 
Last week Cotu and TUC-K asked the government to respect the court order. Kenya
